meanings.sent1: The handfasted couple looked forward to their upcoming wedding.
meanings.sent2: The handfasted pair exchanged rings as a symbol of their commitment.
meanings.sent3: The handfasted duo excitedly planned their future together.
meanings.sent4: Their handfasted status was a promise of love and loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The handfasted lovers shared a deep connection that was evident to all.

meanings.definition: Joined together in marriage or a committed relationship
meanings.sent1: The handfasted husband and wife celebrated their anniversary.
meanings.sent2: The handfasted partners supported each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent3: The handfasted couple's love story was admired by all who knew them.
meanings.sent4: Their handfasted bond grew stronger with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: Being handfasted meant they were united in heart and soul.
